member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData
member.summary: Contains information describing a single blob extracted from the Extended OCR engine. In most cases a blob represents a character. However there are cases where a blob can represent a group of characters.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Baseline
member.summary: The baseline of the blob in the image (pixels).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Bottom
member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the bottom edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Character
member.summary: Gets the string representation of the blob. In most cases a blob represents a character. However there are cases where a blob can represent a group of characters.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Right
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the right edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Left
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the left edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.X
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the left edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Top
member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the top edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.Y
member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the top edge of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.CharacterData.AdvancedCharacterData
member.summary:
This property contains advanced information about the blob.
Note: must be set to to access this property.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData
member.summary:
This class contains advanced information about each recognised blob (character).
Note: must be set to to access the properties in this class.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.ConfidenceScore
member.summary: The confidence score of the recognised blob (character) as computed by the OCR engine. The confidence score ranges from 0 (best confidence) to 255 (worst confidence).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.IsBold
member.summary: Is the blob bold?

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.IsItalic
member.summary: Is the blob italic?

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.IsSubscript
member.summary: Is the blob subscript?

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.IsSuperscript
member.summary: Is the blob superscript?

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.ForegroundColor
member.summary: The foreground color.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.AdvancedCharacterData.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LanguageCandidate
member.summary: Class that contains information about identfied languages when is enabled.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LanguageCandidate.LanguageId
member.summary: The ID of one of the detected languages. Cast to to get the language.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LanguageCandidate.ConfidenceLevel
member.summary: The confidence level of the detected language (lower values are better). A confidence level of 255 is used to indicate that the detection could not succeed in finding a relevant candidate.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData
member.summary: Describes a single line after OCR as a list of objects.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Words
member.summary: Gets the list of words in the line.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Bottom
member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the bottom edge of the line in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Left
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the left edge of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Right
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the right edge of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Top
member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the top edge of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.LineData.LineWords
member.summary: Gets the string representation of all the words in the line.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about each page after it has been OCRed.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.BlankPage
member.summary: Indicates whether the page was detected as blank.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.ImageAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether an image was successfully extracted (after applying all the appropriate pre-processing settings).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: Returns page number for which this page relates to.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Rotation
member.summary: The rotation in degrees (Â°) of the current page. If Autorotate is set to false this will always be 0.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.TextAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether text was extracted for the page.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.DetectedLanguages
member.summary: Returns a list of detected languages when is enabled.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Resolution
member.summary: The resolution of the page (DPI).

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Width
member.summary: The width of the page in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.Height
member.summary: The height of the page in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.PageLines
member.summary: Gets a list of recognised lines of text for the page.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.StatusUpdateEventArgs.ConfidenceScore
member.summary:
The average confidence score of the OCR for the page. The confidence score ranges from 0 (best confidence) to 255 (worst confidence).
Note: must be set to to get the confidence score.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData
member.summary: Contains information about a word recognised by Extended OCR.

member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the bottom edge of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData.CharacterList
member.summary: Gets the list of blobs (characters) in the word.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData.Left
member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the left edge of the word in pixels.

member.summary: Gets the X-coordinate of the right edge of the word in pixels.

member.summary: Gets the Y-coordinate of the top edge of the word in pixels.

member.summary: Gets the width of the word in pixels.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData.Word
member.summary: Gets the string representation of the word.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData.ConfidenceScore
member.summary:
The average confidence score of the recognised word. The confidence score ranges from 0 (best confidence) to 255 (worst confidence).
Note: must be set to 'True' to get the confidence score.

member.name: T:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words
member.summary: This class contains a collection of WordData objects which are available on a page by page basis.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of items contained in the IList.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the character at the current index.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the IList is read-only.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the character at the current index.

member.name: P:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
member.returns: The element at the specified index.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Add(Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData)
member.summary: Adds an item to the IList.
member.param: The WordData to add to the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Contains(Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData)
member.summary: Determines whether the IList contains the specified item.
member.param: The item to locate in the IList.
member.returns: true if the item is found; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.CopyTo(Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the elements of the IList to an Array, starting at a particular Array index.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from IList. The Array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator object that can be used to iterate through the collection of WordData.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.GetFirst
member.summary: Gets the first item in the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.GetHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the height of the item at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the item.
member.returns: The height of the item at the specified index if found in the list; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.GetNext
member.summary: Gets the next item in the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.GetWidth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the width of the item at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the item.
member.returns: The width of the item at the specified index if found in the list; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.IndexOf(Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData)
member.summary: Determines the index of the specified item in the IList.
member.param: The item to locate in the IList.
member.returns: The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Insert(System.Int32,Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData)
member.summary: Inserts an item to the IList at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The item to insert into the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.Remove(Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.WordData)
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific item from the IList.
member.param: The item to remove from the IList.

member.name: M:Aquaforest.ExtendedOCR.Shared.Words.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the IList item at the specified index.
